You can change the theme color of the application.

- Register with BOC Card:  You can now register BOCNET(Personal) and BOC Macau APP with BOC Card at the same time, and enjoy the innovative mobile financing experience. (BOCNET(Personal) and Mobile Banking customers can simply login to BOC Macau APP)

- Mobile Payment: BOC Pay,  Payment QR Code, Going Dutch Payment, Pay-to-Mobile, Pay-to-Friend, 3rd Party Transfer.

- Red Packet:  Expressing your gratitude to all the important people in your life anywhere, anytime.

- Quick Bill Payment:  You can make your payment via scanning the QR Code on your bills.

- Electronic Governance:  Finance Services Bureau, SSM, Transport Bureau, Official Gazette, IACM, DSCC and Macao Economic Services quick portal.

-Online  Account Opening:  You can open Savings, Fixed Deposit or Financial Investment Account by simple fill in your basic personal information via this BOC Macau  APP.

- My Coupon:  Enjoy the hottest promotion via this BOC Macau APP.

- Auspicious Gold:  An excellent choice for investment, and also a precious collectible item.

- BOC E-Fund:  BOC Macau APP offers fund subscription with rich data and charts.

- Structured Products:  Fixed-Term investment, stable income.

-Credit Card Zone: Magnetic Strips, Credit Card Application, Card Payment, the functions of Credit Card set in one.

-Travel Insurance: Before traveling, you can buy the travel insurance via this BOC Macau APP.

-Online Quene: Before handle the business, you can online quene via this BOC Macau APP, no more waiting in line.

-Share Payment QR Code: You can share Payment QR Code with WeChat, WhatsApp and Facebook Messenger.
